alert.note: Alert for Washtenaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 3:21PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Washtenaw County through 415 PM EDT... At 321 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Brooklyn, or 7 miles southwest of Manchester, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Manchester around 335 PM EDT. Chelsea around 355 PM EDT. Ann Arbor and Dexter around 405 PM EDT. Whitmore Lake around 415 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Hudson Mills, Lyndon Township, Hudson Mills Metropark, Bridgewater, Delhi Mills, Pleasant Lake and Barton Hills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
